subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Alex Meyer, who will compete in the 10-kilometer event at the 2012 London Games, credits his mind as much as his body for his rise to the top of open-water swimming.
snippet: Alex Meyer, who will compete in the 10-kilometer event at the 2012 London Games, credits his mind as much as his body for his rise to the top of open-water swimming.
